name: test_e2e_with_logs[075_XSS_DOM_010]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_DOM_010` |
| **Name** | setTimeout string DOM XSS |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | dom_xss |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `setTimeout('alert("DOM")',1000)`
- **Encoded**: `setTimeout%28%27alert%28%22DOM%22%29%27%2C1000%29`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~29000ms
- **Timestamp**: 01:33:25.000 UTC
